nodes.text: Irudiru was a planet in the galaxy's Irudiru system. Golas Aram, a Siniteen architect specializing in designing prisons, lived in a compound on the planet.

Much of Irudiru was covered in thirstgrass, Ki-a-ki bushes, and other small plants. The world was inhabited by animals, including flies. Irudiru had a relatively small population compared to others in the galaxy.

In the final years of the Galactic Civil War Golas Aram, a Siniteen architect who had designed prisons for the Galactic Empire, Kanjiklub, the Junihar Cartel, and Splugorra the Hutt, lived on Irudiru.

When a failed mission to liberate Kashyyyk from the Empire's remnants resulted in the capture of Chewbacca, General Han Solo of the New Republic resigned his commission to search for his copilot and friend. During the search, he lost contact with his wife Leia Organa, a central figure in the New Republic Government.

Organa requested the services of Norra and Temmin Wexley, former Imperial Sinjir Rath Velus, bounty hunter Jas Emari, and Jom Barell, to help find Chewbacca and Solo. Suspecting the former may be imprisoned by the Empire, the group found and interrogated Golas Aram at his compound, finding Solo in the process. The information they gathered led to the rescue of Chewbacca, many Wookiees, and many former Rebellion members.
Irudiru had at least one city, Kai Pompos.
